intro: Rudgea cordata, commonly known as the clustered rudgea, is a flowering plant native to South America. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes coffee and gardenias. Rudgea cordata is valued in horticulture for its ornamental appeal and ability to thrive in shaded environments.
